original_text: No unbelief made him waver concerning the promise of God, but he grew strong in his faith as he gave glory to God,
korean_text: 믿음이 없어 하나님의 약속을 의심하지 않고 믿음으로 견고하여져서 하나님께 영광을 돌리며

sentences.original_text: No unbelief made him waver concerning the promise of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 약속에 대해 그는 불신으로 흔들리지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but he grew strong in his faith
as he gave glory to God
